about_the_game:
Black Raven is an action-adventure third-person-slasher rooted in Slavic urban mythology. Set in a 14th century fictionalized Ukraine. Black Raven transports players to the dark heart of the black death amid the sweeping plains and eerie woodlands of Eastern Europe. This grim tale unfolds after Ivan, a humble farmer, returns home to find his family torn apart by pillagers and evil folklore foes. Fueled by vengeance, he takes on the mantle of the Black Raven to hunt down those who destroyed his life.

Embark on a haunting journey through dense forests, haunted battlegrounds, and desolate villages. Along the way, experience the history of  intense, historically inspired combat against ruthless enemies. 

Fight a diverse cast of folklore villains with unique strengths, dive deeper into the secrets of the land, and feel the weight of Ivan’s descent into a world gripped by despair and disease. 

Black Raven is a melting pot of Ukrainian, Polish, Russian, Belarussian culture and history. With a pixel art graphics style inspired by historical themes and a mysterious story to create an unforgettable atmosphere of anger, loss, and resolve. Journey through Ivan's harrowing story from the quiet countryside to contemptuous towers, where he’ll face his ultimate reckoning.

Features

  • Engaging Slavic Folklore

  • Gripping Narrative

  • Sword-fighting Combat System

  • Dynamic 2.5D Environments

  • Gothic Pixel Art

  • Dark and Atmospheric Soundtrack

Black Raven offers a journey of raw emotion and intense action, leading you through a world shaped by cultural histories and personal vengeance. Prepare to step into the shoes of the Black Raven and face the ultimate cost of revenge.

content_descriptors.notes: Black Raven is intended for mature audiences and contains content that may not be suitable for all players. This game contains intense violence, anguish, some nudity, and graphic depictions of blood and gore. Additionally, it explores mature themes that delve into dark and challenging subject matter.

short_description: Black Raven is a dark 2.5D action-adventure rooted in Slavic Folklore set in 14th-century Eastern-Europe. Play as Ivan, a man consumed by vengeance after a brutal raid shatters his family. Journey through grim landscapes and fight brutal enemies in this dark tale of loss, rage, and resilience.
